headline: Staff Assistant at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)
summary:
Seeking position in Public Affairs/Relations/Communications; Marketing; Human Resources; Operations Management; Training/Employee Development; or Executive Administration.

Can be reached via email at: mayraoneill743@gmail.com

positions.companyName: U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs, Veterans Health Administration
positions.description:

â¢ Provide news clippings to the Regional and Veterans Integrated Service Networks (VISNs) Public Affairs Offices, and other key Veterans Health Administration (VHA) and VA officials in a timely manner. Archive news clip files for use by the agency historians' office and staff; and support media, legislative, community, and staff relations. 

â¢ Research, prepare, and provide photographs, video or audio tapes, medical center operation data, publications, information papers, and other materials as requested by media outlets or management staff.

â¢ Participate as the Public Information Officer (PIO) during emergencies to keep staff informed of ongoing situation. Post messages through Facebook, Twitter, and VA Medical Centerâs external Web page. Update telephone messages to keep the staff and public informed of center closures and operating hours during emergencies.
